alert.note: Alert for Greene; Lenoir; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Greene, northeastern Lenoir and southwestern Pitt Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dawson, or 7 miles north of Kinston, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Kinston, Ayden, Farmville, Grifton, Snow Hill, Dawson, Maury, Ormondsville, Graingers, Institute, Roundtree, Lizzie, Kinston Regional Jetport and Hookerton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
